name: d3-geo
description: Shapes and calculators for spherical coordinates.

scripts.test: tape 'test/**/*-test.js' && mkdir -p test/output && eslint index.js src
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run test && test/compare-images && uglifyjs -b beautify=false,preamble="'$(preamble)'" dist/d3-geo.js -c -m -o dist/d3-geo.min.js
scripts.postpublish: git push && git push --tags && cd ../d3.github.com && git pull && cp ../d3-geo/dist/d3-geo.js d3-geo.v1.js && cp ../d3-geo/dist/d3-geo.min.js d3-geo.v1.min.js && git add d3-geo.v1.js d3-geo.v1.min.js && git commit -m "d3-geo ${npm_package_version}" && git push && cd - && zip -j dist/d3-geo.zip -- LICENSE README.md dist/d3-geo.js dist/d3-geo.min.js
